Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38593 affecting package qt5-qtbase for versions less than 5.12.11-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-38593 affecting package qt5-qtbase for versions less than 5.12.11-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package qt5-qtbase is earlier than 5.12.11-11, affected by CVE-2021-38593
